timeseries.name: timeseries
timeseries.description: Combines loading, filtering and aggregating metrics data into a time series output.
syntax: timeseries [column =] aggregation(metricKey [, filter:] [, default:] [, rollup:] [, rate:] [, scalar:]) [, [column =] aggregation(metricKey, ...), ...] [, by:] [, filter:] [, union:] [, nonempty:] [, interval: | bins:] [, from:] [, to:] [,timeframe:] [,shift:]

parameters.name: aggregation
parameters.description:
The aggregation function that should be used to create the series.
Input values in the aggregation function need to be numeric.

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: The timeframe to fetch data from.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start time for fetching data.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end time for fetching data.

parameters.name: union
parameters.description: Controls how multiple series are combined when data might be absent from one or more columns (or dimensions).

parameters.name: nonempty
parameters.description: Produces empty series when there is no data.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The length of a bucket in the series. Must not be specified if bins is specified. Automatically calculated based on the number of bins.

parameters.name: bins
parameters.description: The number of buckets that should be created for the series. Must not be specified if `interval` is specified. The default value is `120`.

parameters.name: shift
parameters.description: Allows to time-shift the data being queried.

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: The expressions the series should be split by.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: An additional filter condition that shall be applied on the source records before time-/space-aggregation.
